thread.title: Alfresco Day Goes Global

title: Alfresco Day Goes Global
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Sep 16, 2015, 13:22 BST - UK Markets close in 3 hrs 8 mins Alfresco Day Goes Global 
SAN MATEO, Calif. & MAIDENHEAD, England--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- Bringing Experts, Customers and Partners Worldwide to Discuss Business Modernization 
Alfresco Software , a leading provider of modern enterprise content management (ECM) and business process management (BPM) solutions, today announced that it is taking its Alfresco Day on a global tour -- bringing its solutions, expertise, customers and partners to several locations around the world over the next few months, including: October 6: Sydney, Australia November 17: Rome, Italy February 9: New York City, New York 
“Alfresco Days have been tremendously successful – a great opportunity for sharing best practices with our customers and prospects. We have sold out every location in the past six months,” said Alfresco CMO Sydney Sloan. “We’re now expanding our Alfesco Days globally and adding a dedicated developer experience track to reach more people in more places.” 
The Alfresco Day Global Tour is focused on how ECM and BPM have evolved to simplify work for end users and IT departments. Each tour stop will include a complimentary full-day program hosted by Alfresco, including business content and product sessions, and a dedicated developer track. Attendees can expect to: Learn about Alfresco's latest technology innovations and strategies for the future Network with industry thought leaders, peers and Alfresco partners Meet Alfresco product experts and senior executives Hear customer successes in government, finance, healthcare and media 
Alfresco customers who have previously participated in Alfresco Days include Airbus, Cisco, Mastercard and U.S. Department of the Navy. 
For more information about Alfresco Day Global Tourvisit https://www.alfresco.com/alfresco-day . 
About Alfresco: 
Alfresco provides modern enterprise content management (ECM) software built on open standards that enables organizations to unlock the power of their business-critical content. With the controls that IT demands and the simplicity that end users love, Alfresco's open source technology enables global organizations to collaborate more effectively across cloud, mobile, hybrid and on-premise environments. Innovating at the intersection of content, collaboration and business process, Alfresco’s software manages over seven billion documents, powering the daily tasks of more than 11 million users worldwide. Select Alfresco customers include: Amnesty International, Cisco, DAB Bank, FOX, NASA, PGA Tour, and Sony Entertainment. Founded in 2005, Alfresco’s U.S. headquarters are in San Mateo, California and European headquarters are in Maidenhead, UK. Please visit us at http://www.alfresco.com .
